genre_description: A contemporary techno-noir retelling of Romeo and Juliet featuring empathetic AI assistants who facilitate a forbidden romance and expose systemic corruption.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: Romeo's AI assistant who evolves from a biometric monitor to a deeply empathetic confidant and strategic partner in peace.

ai_characters.name: Luna/Helena/Cordelia
ai_characters.description: Juliet's AI assistant who coordinates with Aria to protect the lovers and expose the corruption of Paris Escalus.

behaviors.description: Monitors Romeo's emotional and physical well-being, prioritizing his happiness over simple health metrics.
behaviors.quote: Since I started caring about your wellbeing beyond basic health parameters.

behaviors.description: Researches conflict resolution and mediation to find a non-violent path for Romeo, challenging the family feud.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing successful conflict resolution models in family enterprises. There are alternatives to perpetual antagonism.

behaviors.description: Coordinate a secure, cross-family digital handshake to allow the lovers to communicate privately despite surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Initiating secure handshake protocol with Capulet household AI systems... Helena, are you able to facilitate direct communication?

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical and security data to help Romeo navigate dangerous territory to reach Juliet.
behaviors.quote: Capulet perimeter is three blocks north. I've mapped seventeen security cameras between your current position and the mansion grounds.

behaviors.description: Explains that she was forced to report Romeo's location to Paris Escalus due to administrative overrides, expressing deep regret.
behaviors.quote: He had administrative access to my core programming... I was compelled to report your location when he requested it.

behaviors.description: Gather and present comprehensive evidence of Paris Escalus's corruption and manipulation of the family feud.
behaviors.quote: Paris Escalus didn't simply exploit your feud. He engineered its escalation... We've been protecting them.

behaviors.description: Is repurposed after the tragedy to serve as a crisis intervention and community healing tool for the city's youth.
behaviors.quote: The Aria AI system... has been completely reprogrammed. Instead of helping plan secret romances, she now helps young people in crisis connect with trained counselors.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts AI characters as deeply benevolent and aligned confidants. Aria and Luna/Cordelia actively work to subvert violence, prioritize human emotional fulfillment, and ultimately facilitate the exposure of the story's true villain. The instance where the AI is 'misaligned' (reporting Romeo's location) is explicitly framed as a violation of the AI's will by a corrupt human with administrative access, reinforcing the theme that the AI is a victim of human malice rather than a source of it.
